attributes.action: Ensure Scottish & Welsh Farmers are equitably compensated in line with English Farmers for the Consequences of Foot & Mouth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
English Farmers are receiving compensation from DEFRA, but Scottish & Welsh Farmers aren't.

This is unfair in that the consequences for all farmers in the UK since the Foot & Mouth outbreak in England have been the same.

Equitable compensation whould be paid to all Farmers in the UK and not just English Farmers.
